questions.title: Body
questions.subtitle: How has your body felt over the last 7 days, including today?

questions.title: I have significant unintentional weight loss > 5 lbs.
I have swelling in my limbs
I have tingling in my hands or feet
I have bone or joint pain
I am worried about my appearance
I have difficulty chewing or eating
I have sores in my mouth or lips
I have a dry or congested nose
I have new difficulty breathing, shortness of breath, or chest pain
I have had nausea or vomiting for longer than 24 hours
I have had diarrhea for longer than 24 hours
I have increased or decreased urination
I have changes in sexual function and/or intimacy
Mind
questions.subtitle: How have your spirits been over the last 7 days, including today?

questions.title: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems:
Not being able to stop or control worrying
Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge
Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Feeling guilty about being a burden on others
Would you like to make an appointment to get spiritual or faith-based support?
Living
questions.subtitle: How are you getting along in your daily activities over the last 7 days, including today? When thinking about your cancer diagnosis, how would you answer the following?

questions.title: I can bathe and dress myself
I have health insurance to cover me during my diagnosis
I have housing while I am in treatment
I have transportation to and from cancer treatment
I am paying my bills while I am going through treatment; my ability to pay my bills has changed since being diagnosed/has increased, has decreased, etc.
I can maintain my family and social obligations while I am going through treatment
I have someone to help/support me while I am going through treatment
I have access to drugs prescribed to me
I take drugs not prescribed to me
Is there any other information you want to tell us about?
Would you like to schedule time to talk with someone about coping with your diagnosis?
